text: Went to buy some medical supplies for my family, the place is not crowded and the female staff was courteous and friendly. Will frequent this place again.
Victor is an exemplary staff of Watsons as he is very helpful and has lots of patience in explaining the billing in the long receipt.

This morning, I headed to my neighborhood watsons to refund a set of tissues(2 for 8.90) as they were defective(there were two boxes that were lighter than the others). When the cashier opened them, they were half filled. I did not want to refund for the same set of tissues as I was afraid that it would have the same defect and  asked to refund for a cheaper one(2 for 8.50). However, I was then requested to pay an extra 4.50 despite the decrease in value. Throughout the entire exchange, the cashier was extremely unpleasant and did not once apologize for the mistake on watsons part. Iâ€™ve been a consistent customer at this franchise for many years and have left a highly disappointed in their service and product quality. Would not recommend buying their tissues if you are given a choice.
super friendly staff and not crowded. just note that this store does not have a pharmacist. overall, you can get the majority of your necessities here.
Served by Gladys. My mum needed to get a knee guard. She went beyond her duty and assisted my mum to put it on.
